entry.title: My first dreamforce experience
entry.content:
How it started

This year, my company where I work at, salesfive, gave me the possibility to attend dreamforce for the first time ever. This was the first real dreamforce after the two full years of COVID-19 pandemic. It was an amazing experience and I am very lucky that I work in such a company where these opportunities are given.

In this first post, I am sharing some pictures that I took during dreamforce.

Hope you all enjoy it üôåüèº

Picture Gallery

This was taken while walking down the street which takes you to Moscone Center.

Trailblazer Forest where almost all the session where held (Moscone West). I spent here most of my time in the ‚ÄúArchitect Vista‚Äù.

ZOHO CRM throwing shade during dreamforce. Iirc, sugar CRM also had a bus with ads going around üòÇ (they can try but they will never be as good as sfdc)
